page.title: 06HOLLINGWORTH TRAFFIC COUNT
page.content: The main road in Hollingworth is called Market Street . Market Street is very busy because lorries, vans and cars use it because it is part of the A 628 Trunk Road from Manchester to Sheffield. On Wednesday, 15 May 1985 Class 2F of St Andrew's School, Hadfield went to count traffic along Market Street for half an hour. The results were: 2 bicycles 6 motorcycles 55 vans 46 lorries 43 articulated lorries 4 single decker buses 5 double decker buses 2 tractors 345 cars This was a mid morning count and shows how heavy the traffic is. When people go to and return from work it's worse.
